caption.p: Individual treatments of the mint flavor components including ( a) l-menthol, ( b) l-menthyl acetate, ( c) l-menthone, and ( d) piperitone. Each of the subcritical water treatments was carried out at 240 Â°C for 60 min. Before the analysis of GC-MS, phenol (internal standard) was mixed with the treated sample and the final concentration of phenol was 1% ( w/v).
